# Truth (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* | Church of the Silver Flame, the Path of Light |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Powers:** You gain a bonus on [[Sense Motive (Skill)|Sense Motive]] checks equal to your cleric level. You cast divination spells at +1 caster level.

**Truth Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Detect Thoughts (Spell)|Detect Thoughts]]****:** Allows “listening” to surface thoughts.

**2** **[[Zone of Truth (Spell)|Zone of Truth]]****:** Subjects within range cannot lie.

**3** **[[See Invisibility (Spell)|See Invisibility]]****:** Reveals invisible creatures or objects.

**4** **[[Discern Lies (Spell)|Discern Lies]]****:** Reveals deliberate falsehoods.

**5** **[[True Seeing (Spell)|True Seeing]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Lets you see all things as they really are.

**6** **[[Force Shapechange (Spell)|Force Shapechange]]****:** Forces shapechangers into natural form.

**7** **[[Illusion Purge (Spell)|Illusion Purge]]****:** Dispels illusions within 5 ft./level.

**8** **[[Discern Location (Spell)|Discern Location]]****:** Reveals exact location of creature or object.

**9** **[[True Seeing (Spell)|True Seeing]]****, Mass:** As *[[True Seeing (Spell)|true seeing]]*, but affects multiple creatures.

**Source:** Races of Eberron (WotC), pg. 181
